reviewText: In this days, it is nice to watch films like this one....very hopeful and full of life, the story based on a real fact, it is an example of overcoming for everybody. Life is for living it...

this is an excellent film that will capture your attention once that you start watching it, You will enjoy it even if you do not speak Italian, it does not comes with english subtitles, but the essence of the movie will capture your heart.
